level.text: The following are empowered to issue Notices of Infraction for parking violations within their respective jurisdictions:
District of Columbia Protective Services;
District of Columbia Department of Human Services at D.C. General Hospital;
District of Columbia Department of Public Works;
Saint Elizabeth’s Hospital Security Force;
United States Bureau of Engraving and Printing;
United States Government Printing Office;
United States Park Police Visitor Aides;
University of the District of Columbia Security Police;
Fort Lesley J. McNair;
District of Columbia Public Library;
United States Department of Commerce Special Agents;
United States Defense Intelligence Agency;
United States Central Intelligence Agency Security Protective Service;
Superior Court of the District of Columbia Security Police;
United States Supreme Court Police;
District of Columbia Housing Authority Special Police Officers: and
United States Department of State Uniformed Protection Officers.
REPEALED
When information is entered on the ticket manually, the original ticket, signed by the issuing officer, constitutes a complaint.
A copy of the signed ticket shall be issued to the respondent in the manner provided for in § 3004.
The respondent may use the copy as a form for answering the Notice in accordance with § 3007 of this chapter.
When a hand-held electronic device is used, the one-page printout Notice shall constitute the complaint.
The one-page printout Notice will be issued to the respondent, as provided in § 3004.
The respondent may use the reverse side of the one-page printout Notice as a form for answering the Notice in accordance with § 3007 of this chapter.
Except for tickets issued through the use of a hand-held electronic device, the original ticket shall be submitted to the Department of Motor Vehicles within fifteen (15) calendar days of issuance.

Except for tickets issued by certified mail pursuant to § 3004.9(b), the ticket information for tickets issued through the use of a hand-held electronic device shall be submitted within one (1) business day.
